FuncDef: The display bgp vpn-target routing-table statistics command displays statistics information about routes in the BGP-VPN-Target address family.
CLIs: display bgp vpn-target routing-table { [ peer <ipv4-address> { advertised-routes | received-routes } ] | [ origin-as <origin-as-num> ] } statistics

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays information about routes advertised to a specified peer.
-

Displays information about the routes received from the specified peer.
-

Displays information about routes with the specified origin AS number in the BGP-VPN-Target address family.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpn-target routing-table peer 10.2.2.2 received-routes statistics
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp vpn-target routing-table statistics command displays statistics information about routes in the BGP-VPN-Target address family.
